name: Meat Sauce
keywords: dry red wine, meat sauce, main course
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano or 2 teaspoons dried oregano leaves
1 tablespoon chopped fresh basil or 1 teaspoon dried basil
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: To the basic meat sauce mixture add the remaining ingredients.
Simmer about 1 hour, until the mixture is thick.
Sauce can be refrigerated up to three days or frozen for longer.
